channel.title: Project P2P // Banned from advertising
channel.description:
Server banned from advertising on Moparscape, again.
If you're looking for an RSC server to play then I suggest checking out the other servers that are being advertised. RSCAngel is quite popular.

item.title: Project P2P // Banned from advertising
item.dc:creator: @bamboozola bamboozola
item.description:
@bamboozola wrote:

[quote=“ProjectP2P, post:272, topic:307232”]Slip, you do know bans aren’t ALWAYS handled by me. I was gone for 13 days (13th till the 26th) and wasn’t on PP2P. So fail on your part for thinking I banned you. A kid posted on the forums that he was using your account, Which then my mods who are ABLE TO IP BAN people on the forums, obviously banned you.

Also Mind freak, your very judgmental. Just because I took money in the past, doesn’t give you the right to say I steal money now. You honestly don’t know and make accusations like that is pretty … immature. What about RSCA, and RSCE, KING-PK? I’m 100% sure they take in donation money too. But nope, it’s always me that gets hit with the nail and hammer. Funny stuff.

Anyways, Made a few updates, just got back yesterday.

Check them out in the changelog - Link http://projectp2p.net/viewforum.php?id=41[/quote]
you have not changed nor will you ever change its your humon nature to be a dick and allow your girlfriend to support you go get a job and supoprt yourself and stop making excuses to open donations again need another ps3 game? i think so…

Read full topic

item.title: Project P2P // Banned from advertising
item.dc:creator: @ProjectP2P ProjectP2P
item.description:
@ProjectP2P wrote:

Whoever is sending me mass emails through my website, I hope you do know, that GMAIL has a amazing spam filter, and automatically blocks the spam. It wasn’t until today I decided to spontaneously look into my spam folder and notice 23,000 emails saying ‘mattismad requested a new password at projectp2p.net’

I lol’d a lil bit.

<3

Read full topic

item.title: Project P2P // Banned from advertising
item.dc:creator: @ecstacy ecstacy
item.description:
@ecstacy wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:1, topic:307240”]As you said in one of your posts, people aren’t stupid and they’ll see this blatant fake attempt at being nice. Lets say for example you do win people over and have a successful server with 50+ online most of the time, you’ll then get a big head like before and introduce donations again. It’s history repeating itself.

For example, look at Luke, Kryptix. Good kid, but he hates me. Don’t blame him though… But he does a very good job at what he does.

Take a look at this quote. You switch things round and make it look like you like me, but I hate you. I must admit, you’re almost convincing. You forget to mention that you IP banned me and deleted all my characters that I (legit) trained for 2 months. You forget to mention that you deleted Adx1’s forum accounts (as well as his several 99hp characters) for simply posting some constructive criticism. You forget to mention that you deleted Nicholas’ and Ztooner’s forum accounts (as well as their characters) for being on RSCEmulation. All of these decisions are RECENT, AFTER you promised everyone that you were going to change.

You forget Matt, I trusted you, I invested hours, days, weeks into your server and pretty much everything I’ve done to RSCEmulation, I offered to do for you. Pretty much every suggestion I’ve implemented (or had implemented) was suggested on Project P2P but you chose to ignore it. I’m not even gunna lie, RSCEmulation only grew as fast as it did because you messed up. You lost everyone’s trust and now a LOT of your players are now RSCEmulation players. They’ve now invested a lot of time into RSCEmulation and I doubt they’ll ‘switch’ easily, unless of course we mess up as badly as you did, but I highly doubt that because we care for our community, listen to suggests and generally treat players with the respect they deserve. We make absolutely no profit at RSCEmulation (our choice), and we still give them respect. Your players were putting food on your table every-single-day and you still treated them like scum.

Believe me, I’d post it on the Project P2P forums but I’d just get IP banned and told to ‘fuck off faggot :]’ so there’s really not a lot of point.

I wish you the best of luck with it, but I really can’t see it going anywhere. Before RSCEmulation and RSCDevil came around people didn’t really have much choice if they wanted a fast XP rate server, whilst still staying semi-original (not a dedicated PK/stake server), but now RSCEmulation has launched as well as RSCDevil so people actually have a choice.

Anyway, if you want to talk and genuinely want to hear my view, unblock me on MSN and we’ll have a chat.[/quote]

very true facts about matt

Read full topic
